model.name: Scarf Print Mini Shorts
model.disambiguatingDescription: Graphic yet summery: These statement straight-cut mini shorts are crafted from sturdy cotton gabardine in an allover print made up of iconic bag straps from the leather goods collection. The collection’s black-and-gold button refines the fastening, while leather and Monogram patches add a runway accent.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Main Material : 100% Cotton
  • Other Material : Lamb, Coated PVC
  • Lining : 100% Cotton
  • Grey
  • Regular fit
  • Model wears size 36
  • Model measurements : Bust 30,5'' / 77 cm, Height 5' 10" / 177 cm, Waist 22,5'' / 57 cm, Hips 34'' / 86 cm
  • Made in Italy
  • Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professionnal dry cleaning in hydrocarbons
